Simplifies the workflow for fitting and training a knn model

Source: R/model_workflow.R
model_workflow.Rd

Simplifies the workflow for fitting and training a knn model

model_workflow(data, num_folds, range_neighbors, response)

Arguments

data

The dataset to be split into training and testing sets

num_folds

The desired number of folds to use for cross validation

range_neighbors

A sequence of the desired values of k

response

The response variable

Value

a fitted model

Examples

data <- data.frame(
a = rnorm(1000),
b = rnorm(1000),
cultivar = sample(c(1,2,3), 1000, replace = TRUE)
)
num_folds <- 5
range_neighbors <- seq(1, 20)
response <- "cultivar"
model_workflow(data, num_folds, range_neighbors, response)
